page.title: 02A SCHOOL DAY AT BITTESWELL.
page.content: Nearly all the primary age children in our block attends St. Mary's Church of England Aided School.There are about 70 in all.Two thirds of them live too far away to walk,so most of them come on a school bus,although a few are brought by car. We have to be at the bus stop at 8.30 or 8.40 depending which village we live in.The bus usually gets to school by 8.55 except if it breaks down or it is icy or snowy.The journey is from Frolesworth to Leire to Ashby Parva to school. School starts at 9.00,play is from 10,30. to 10.45.,sandwich is from 12.00 to 1.30., and school finishes at 3.30.
